container.heading: State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Special Hospital — Chronic Services

section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: The State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Special Hospital — Chronic Services is incorporated by reference.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §§19-109(a)(1), 19-118, and 19-120(f), Annotated Code of Maryland

Regulation .01 adopted as an emergency provision effective February 1, 1991 (18:4 Md. R. 445); emergency status extended at 18:17 Md. R. 1911 and 19:3 Md. R. 302; emergency status superseded at 19:8 Md. R. 800, effective April 2, 1992
Regulation .01 adopted as an emergency provision effective April 2, 1992 (19:8 Md. R. 800); adopted permanently effective July 6, 1992 (19:13 Md. R. 1202)
Regulation .01 amended effective May 8, 1995 (22:9 Md. R. 644); May 5, 1997 (24:9 Md. R. 657); December 1, 1997 (24:24 Md. R. 1670); August 9, 1999 (26:16 Md. R. 1246)
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective April 15, 2002 (29:7 Md. R. 619)
Regulation .01 amended effective March 12, 2007 (34:5 Md. R. 560); October 14, 2013 (40:20 Md. R. 1652); April 11, 2016 (43:7 Md. R. 450); July 15, 2019 (46:14 Md. R. 621)
